                       <svg class="sc-14oxdvn-0 sc-138rgit-0 jMoswN sc-1nu7rd6-3 fqJBPx" data-test="review-verified-icon" viewbox="0 0 300 300" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                        <title>
                         Verified Patient Review
                        </title>
                        <path d="M283.7 82.8L154.5 208.6h-45.4V90.4h34.7v80.8S262.9 55.3 264.4 53.8C237 21.2 195.9.4 150 .4 67.4.4.2 67.6.2 150.2.2 232.8 67.4 300 150 300s149.8-67.2 149.8-149.8c0-24.2-5.8-47.1-16.1-67.4z" fill="#00E6AF">
                        </path>
                       </svg>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="sc-192nc1l-0 buuGUE i5k0wr-0 iDjpkc" data-test="collapsible-block" data-testid="statement-content">
                      Attention: Effective March 2020 
       *****VIDEO CONFERENCING APPOINTMENTS NOW AVAILABLE*****

Due to the Coronavirus pandemic, we are now offering telemedicine appointments. These are appointments which are conducted with Dr. Haroutiounian via your mobile phone or desktop computer without you having to leave your home. Once your appointment has been confirmed, a link will be sent to you by someone in the office that will allow you access to your video appointment with Dr. Haroutiounian on the date and time you have chosen. 
Dr. George Haroutiounian is a skilled gastroenterologist serving the community of New York, NY. Dr. Haroutiounian attended the University of Rochester, where he received his medical degree. He also completed his residency at the University of Rochester Medical Center and he is fellowship trained at Columbia University.
Dr. Haroutiounian currently runs his own practice and is board certified in gastroenterology by the American Board of Internal Medicine. Patients visit him for a wide spectrum of common and specialized medical needs, including acid reflux/heartburn, celiac disease, Crohn's disease, cirrhosis, and hemorrhoids. He is an active member of the American Society of Gastrointestinal Endoscopy.
Dr. Haroutiounian communicates with his patients with clarity and ensures they have all the information they need to make the right treatment choices. He is flexible in working with the changing trends in medicine and in the healthcare market.

                         Verified Patient Review

                        <path d="M283.7 82.8L154.5 208.6h-45.4V90.4h34.7v80.8S262.9 55.3 264.4 53.8C237 21.2 195.9.4 150 .4 67.4.4.2 67.6.2 150.2.2 232.8 67.4 300 150 300s149.8-67.2 149.8-149.8c0-24.2-5.8-47.1-16.1-67.4z" fill="#00E6AF">

                     <div class="sc-192nc1l-0 buuGUE i5k0wr-0 iDjpkc" data-test="collapsible-block" data-testid="statement-content">
                      Dr. Ofem Ajah is a competent and well-respected gastroenterologist. He is currently working with NYP - Gastroenterology, located in Brooklyn, NY. He is also affiliated with NewYork-Presbyterian Brooklyn Methodist Hospital in the same location. 

As a part of his education, Dr. Ajah attended the University of Ilorin College of Health Sciences, where he received his medical degree. He then completed his internship at the University of Calabar Teaching Hospital. After this, he completed his residency and a fellowship at Interfaith Medical Center. 

Dr. Ajah is board certified by the American Board of Internal Medicine with a specialization in gastroenterology. He is qualified to treat an array of conditions and is committed to providing the best comprehensive medical care available. He is fluent in English and Spanish.
                      <div class="sc-192nc1l-1 ewhUaU hidden" data-test="children-wrap">

                       <svg class="sc-14oxdvn-0 sc-138rgit-0 jMoswN sc-1nu7rd6-3 fqJBPx" data-test="review-verified-icon" viewbox="0 0 300 300" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                        <title>
                         Verified Patient Review
                        </title>
                        <path d="M283.7 82.8L154.5 208.6h-45.4V90.4h34.7v80.8S262.9 55.3 264.4 53.8C237 21.2 195.9.4 150 .4 67.4.4.2 67.6.2 150.2.2 232.8 67.4 300 150 300s149.8-67.2 149.8-149.8c0-24.2-5.8-47.1-16.1-67.4z" fill="#00E6AF">

                     <div class="sc-192nc1l-0 buuGUE i5k0wr-0 iDjpkc" data-test="collapsible-block" data-testid="statement-content">
                      Dr. Glockenberg is a board-certified gastroenterologist and internist.  She earned her B.A. from Harvard University where she graduated magna cum laude and her M.D. from Albert Einstein College of Medicine where she was elected to the Alpha Omega Alpha Medical Honor Society. She completed her residency in Internal Medicine at Weill Cornell-New York Presbyterian Hospital and fellowship in Gastroenterology at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center.  She has presented at national and international meetings and has published peer-reviewed research articles. 

Dr. Glockenberg practices general gastroenterology including colon cancer screening and management of acid reflux disease, celiac disease, irritable bowel syndrome, inflammatory bowel disease and liver disease.
                      <div class="sc-192nc1l-1 ewhUaU hidden" data-test="children-wrap">

                   <div class="sc-192nc1l-0 buuGUE i5k0wr-0 iDjpkc" data-test="collapsible-block" data-testid="statement-content">
                    Dr. Glockenberg is a board-certified gastroenterologist and internist.  She earned her B.A. from Harvard University where she graduated magna cum laude and her M.D. from Albert Einstein College of Medicine where she was elected to the Alpha Omega Alpha Medical Honor Society. She completed her residency in Internal Medicine at Weill Cornell-New York Presbyterian Hospital and fellowship in Gastroenterology at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center.  She has presented at national and international meetings and has published peer-reviewed research articles. 

Dr. Glockenberg practices general gastroenterology including colon cancer screening and management of acid reflux disease, celiac disease, irritable bowel syndrome, inflammatory bowel disease and liver disease.

     <div class="ofomod-4 fUAgpq" data-test="faq-block">
      <div class="ofomod-5 drCSa-D" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/FAQPage">
       <div>
        <section class="sc-13a0bfj-0 ofomod-0 jWcyhm">
         Frequently asked questions
        </section>
       </div>
       <div>
        <section class="sc-13a0bfj-0 ofomod-1 htfjSz">
         <div class="ofomod-2 iDDWDw">
          <div itemprop="mainEntity" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Question">
           <div class="ofomod-3 gaGIoJ">
            <div itemprop="name">
             <h3>
              How can I make a same-day appointment with a doctor for Gastroenterology Consultation?
             </h3>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
            <div itemprop="text">
             <p>
              On average, patients who use Zocdoc can search for a doctor for Gastroenterology Consultation, book an appointment, and
              <a href="https://www.zocdoc.com/gastroenterologists?utm_source=google&amp;utm_medium=search&amp;utm_campaign=faq&amp;utm_content=listing-1" rel="nofollow">
               see the doctor within 24 hours
              </a>
              . Same-day appointments are often available, you can search for real-time availability of doctors for Gastroenterology Consultation in your area who accept your insurance and
              <a href="https://www.zocdoc.com/gastroenterologists?utm_source=google&amp;utm_medium=search&amp;utm_campaign=faq&amp;utm_content=listing-1" rel="nofollow">
               make an appointment online
              </a>
              .
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <hr width="100%"/>
        </section>
       </div>
       <div>
        <section class="sc-13a0bfj-0 ofomod-1 htfjSz">
         <div class="ofomod-2 iDDWDw">
          <div itemprop="mainEntity" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Question">
           <div class="ofomod-3 gaGIoJ">
            <div itemprop="name">
             <h3>
              How can I find a doctor for Gastroenterology Consultation who takes my insurance?
             </h3>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
            <div itemprop="text">
             <p>
              Zocdoc lets you search specifically for
              <a href="https://www.zocdoc.com/gastroenterologists?utm_source=google&amp;utm_medium=search&amp;utm_campaign=faq&amp;utm_content=listing-2" rel="nofollow">
               doctors for Gastroenterology Consultation
              </a>
              who take your insurance. Just
              <a href="https://www.zocdoc.com/gastroenterologists?utm_source=google&amp;utm_medium=search&amp;utm_campaign=faq&amp;utm_content=listing-2" rel="nofollow">
               choose your carrier and plan
              </a>
              from the drop-down menu at the top of the page. If youre not sure which plan you have, you can use Zocdocs insurance checker to find out.
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <hr width="100%"/>
        </section>
       </div>
       <div>
        <section class="sc-13a0bfj-0 ofomod-1 htfjSz">
         <div class="ofomod-2 iDDWDw">
          <div itemprop="mainEntity" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Question">
           <div class="ofomod-3 gaGIoJ">
            <div itemprop="name">
             <h3>
              How can I book an appointment online with a doctor for Gastroenterology Consultation?
             </h3>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
            <div itemprop="text">
             <p>
              Zocdoc is a free online service that helps patients find doctors for Gastroenterology Consultation and
              <a href="https://www.zocdoc.com/gastroenterologists?utm_source=google&amp;utm_medium=search&amp;utm_campaign=faq&amp;utm_content=listing-3" rel="nofollow">
               book appointments instantly
              </a>
              . You can search for doctors for Gastroenterology Consultation or any other visit reason. Then, enter your desired appointment location and choose your insurance plan. Based on that information, youll see a list of providers who meet your search criteria, along with their
              <a href="https://www.zocdoc.com/gastroenterologists?utm_source=google&amp;utm_medium=search&amp;utm_campaign=faq&amp;utm_content=listing-3" rel="nofollow">
               available appointment slots
              </a>
              .
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <hr width="100%"/>
        </section>
       </div>
       <div>
        <section class="sc-13a0bfj-0 ofomod-1 htfjSz">
         <div class="ofomod-2 iDDWDw">
          <div itemprop="mainEntity" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Question">
           <div class="ofomod-3 gaGIoJ">
            <div itemprop="name">
             <h3>
              How can I find a female Gastroenterology Consultation doctor?
             </h3>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
            <div itemprop="text">
             <p>
              When you search for
              <a href="https://www.zocdoc.com/gastroenterologists?utm_source=google&amp;utm_medium=search&amp;utm_campaign=faq&amp;utm_content=listing-4" rel="nofollow">
               Gastroenterology Consultation doctors
              </a>
              on Zocdoc, you can filter your results by gender, in addition to other criteria. That way, youll only see doctors who match your preferences.
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <hr width="100%"/>
        </section>
       </div>
       <div>
        <section class="sc-13a0bfj-0 ofomod-1 htfjSz">
         <div class="ofomod-2 iDDWDw">
          <div itemprop="mainEntity" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Question">
           <div class="ofomod-3 gaGIoJ">
            <div itemprop="name">
             <h3>
              How can I find a Gastroenterology Consultation doctor who sees patients after hours?
             </h3>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
            <div itemprop="text">
             <p>
              On Zocdoc, you can search specifically for
              <a href="https://www.zocdoc.com/gastroenterologists?utm_source=google&amp;utm_medium=search&amp;utm_campaign=faq&amp;utm_content=listing-5" rel="nofollow">
               Gastroenterology Consultation doctors
              </a>
              with availability after 5 p.m.
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <hr width="100%"/>
        </section>
       </div>
       <div>
        <section class="sc-13a0bfj-0 ofomod-1 htfjSz">
         <div class="ofomod-2 iDDWDw">
          <div itemprop="mainEntity" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Question">
           <div class="ofomod-3 gaGIoJ">
            <div itemprop="name">
             <h3>
              How can I find a top-rated Gastroenterology Consultation doctor?
             </h3>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
            <div itemprop="text">
             <p>
              You can use Zocdoc to
              <a href="https://www.zocdoc.com/gastroenterologists?utm_source=google&amp;utm_medium=search&amp;utm_campaign=faq&amp;utm_content=listing-6" rel="nofollow">
               find Gastroenterology Consultation doctors
              </a>
              who are highly rated by other patients. These ratings are based on verified reviews submitted by real patients. Every time a patient completes an appointment booked on Zocdoc, theyre invited to review their experience. Each review must comply with
              <a href="https://www.zocdoc.com/about/verifiedreviews?utm_source=google&amp;utm_medium=search&amp;utm_campaign=faq&amp;utm_content=listing-6" rel="nofollow">
               Zocdocs guidelines
              </a>
              .
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <hr width="100%"/>
        </section>
       </div>
       <div>
        <section class="sc-13a0bfj-0 ofomod-1 htfjSz">
         <div class="ofomod-2 iDDWDw">
          <div itemprop="mainEntity" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Question">
           <div class="ofomod-3 gaGIoJ">
            <div itemprop="name">
             <h3>
              How can I find a video visit with a Gastroenterology Consultation doctor online?
             </h3>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
            <div itemprop="text">
             <p>
              Gastroenterology Consultation doctors on Zocdoc who see patients through online video visits will have a purple video icon on their profiles. You can also filter your search results to show only Gastroenterology Consultation doctors who offer video visits.
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <hr width="100%"/>
        </section>
       </div>
       <div>
        <section class="sc-13a0bfj-0 ofomod-1 htfjSz">
         <div class="ofomod-2 iDDWDw">
          <div itemprop="mainEntity" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Question">
           <div class="ofomod-3 gaGIoJ">
            <div itemprop="name">
             <h3>
              Are video visits with a Gastroenterology Consultation doctor online covered by my insurance?
             </h3>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
            <div itemprop="text">
             <p>
              Most insurers provide coverage for video visits at the same cost as in-person visits. You can search on Zocdoc specifically for Gastroenterology Consultation doctors who accept your insurance for video visits by selecting your carrier and plan from the drop-down menu at the top of the page. We recommend you check with your insurance carrier directly to confirm your coverage and out of pocket costs for video visits.
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <hr width="100%"/>
        </section>
       </div>
       <div>
        <section class="sc-13a0bfj-0 ofomod-1 htfjSz">
         <div class="ofomod-2 iDDWDw">
          <div itemprop="mainEntity" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Question">
           <div class="ofomod-3 gaGIoJ">
            <div itemprop="name">
             <h3>
              How can I find a Gastroenterology Consultation doctor who sees patients in the morning or evening?
             </h3>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer">
            <div itemprop="text">
             <p>
              Zocdoc lets you search specifically for a Gastroenterology Consultation doctor who has appointments available before 10:00 am, or after 5:00 pm. Just choose the special hours filter at the top of our search page.
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <hr width="100%"/>
        </section>
       </div>

Colonoscopy and Upper GI Endoscopy are performed at Carnegie Hill Endoscopy, a state-of-the-art facility. The revolutionary Fuse endoscope system allows me to see more of the GI tract than ever before. While traditional endoscopes offer a limited field of view (no more than 170\u00B0 for colonoscope or up to 150\u00B0 for gastroscope), the Fuse endoscope system provides a significantly expanded field of view (330\u00B0 for colonoscope; 245\u00B0 for gastroscope). I was fortunate to learn from some of the world leaders on the management of complex Crohn\u2019s and colitis, and the skills I have learned continue to be part of my practice. In addition, since Crohn\u2019s disease often involves the small intestine, I have spent additional time learning how to perform procedures to assess the small intestine \u2013 capsule endoscopy and double balloon small bowel enteroscopy.   <script>
   function sendSessionRecording() {
    var splitUrl=window.location.href.split("?"),
        requestUrl=encodeURIComponent(splitUrl[0]),
        referrer=encodeURIComponent(document.referrer),
        querystrings=encodeURIComponent(splitUrl.length<2?"":splitUrl[1]),
        pageType=encodeURIComponent("ListingPage"),
        xhttp=new window.XMLHttpRequest;

    xhttp.open("GET",ZD.configs.API_HOST+"/humanrecording/fullrecordhandler?pagetype="+pageType+"&requestUrl="+requestUrl+"&referrer="+referrer+"&querystrings="+querystrings,!0);
    xhttp.send();
}

window.addEventListener('load', sendSessionRecording);
  </script>
  <script>
   function gtmFunc() {(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];
            w[l].push({'gtm.start': new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js', });
            var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';
            j.async=true;j.src='//www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl
            ;
            f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
        })(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-NF4MWM');}
                
                function addListener(optOut) {
                    if (optOut) {
                        window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                        window.dataLayer.push({
                            'paset': 'out',                    
                        });
                    }

                    if (document.readyState === 'complete') {
                        //load already fired
                        gtmFunc();
                    }
                    else {
                        window.addEventListener('load', gtmFunc);
                    }
                }
                
                function getCookie(name) {
                    var nameEQ = name + "=";
                    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
                    for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
                        var c = ca[i];
                        while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
                        if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
                    }
                    return null;
                }

                function optOutGetAsync(theUrl, callback) {
                    try {
                        var xsrf = getCookie('xsrf');                        
                        if (xsrf === null) {
                            // if they have no xsrf cookie, auth won't work, so don't call the api
                            // and do not opt them out
                            callback(false);
                            return;
                        }
                        var xmlHttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
                        xmlHttp.withCredentials = true;
                        xmlHttp.onreadystatechange = function() {
                            if (xmlHttp.readyState == 4 && xmlHttp.status == 200) {
                                var responseObject = JSON.parse(xmlHttp.responseText);
                                //invert the bool to swap to opt out
                                callback(!responseObject.is_opted_in);
                            }
                            else if (xmlHttp.readyState == 4) {
                                //done, but in some error state
                                console.log('error state');
                                callback(false);
                            }
                        };
                        xmlHttp.open('GET', theUrl, true); // true for asynchronous
                        xmlHttp.setRequestHeader('x-xsrf-token', xsrf);
                        xmlHttp.send(null);
                    }
                    catch(e) {
                        //TODO: sentry log or something
                        console.log(e);
                    }                    
                }
                
                if (document.cookie.indexOf('paset=out') > -1) {
                    addListener(true);
                }
                else if (document.cookie.indexOf('paset=in') > -1) {
                    addListener(false);
                }
                else {
                    optOutGetAsync(window.ZD.configs.CLEARDATA_API_HOST + '/cpa/v1/request/is-opted-in', function(optOut) {
                            addListener(optOut);
                        }
                    );
                }
  </script>

  </script>
